name: Koziołek Matołek Wynalazca
storyline: Welcome to the second part of educational games with Matołek the Goat. This time nice Matołek wants to get a secret recipe for getting ‘six’ grades at school and, in order to achieve that, he has to solve tasks from different fields of knowledge. He learns arithmetic and the alphabet, explores completely new notions, such as time and working of a clock, construction of machines and appliances, factors influencing the weather, measurements of weight, length, and capacity. He exercises reflex, memory, and logical thinking. Particular emphasis was laid on games in which more than one player may participate: the Omnibus quiz-show and the ‘Za-mee-k’ board game. The first one is a quiz on general knowledge, including such fields as: geography, the world of animals and plants, sports, spelling, and English. The board game is a castle race with many surprises. Both games may be played by several players and therefore they constitute great entertainment for the whole family or group of friends. All the games are available in training and feature versions.
summary: A set of interesting, addictive games and educational games with the friendly Matołek the lead role. Our hero wants to get a mysterious recipe for six at school here.
